channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for UT
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for UT

item.title: Report X-2024010374
item.description:
Report X-2024010374

Identified by scraper @ 2024-01-16T18:13:17+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-01-06
  • City: SAINT GEORGE
  • State: UT
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: PACKAGE WAS DISCOVERED TO BE LEAKING IN TRAILER WHILE UNLOADING, DESIGNATED RESPONDER WAS ALERTED AND RESPONDED BY ABSORBING LEAKED LIQUID WITH ZEP ZORBENT AND MOVED LEAKING CONTAINER IN A SPILL TRAY TO THE PROCESSING AREA WHERE DAMAGED CONTAINER WAS HANDLED PER HAZMAT PROCEDURES.

item.title: Report X-2024010162
item.description:
Report X-2024010162

Identified by scraper @ 2024-01-12T18:13:06+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-01-05
  • City: SALT LAKE CITY
  • State: UT
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: WEARING FULL PPE AND FOLLOWING DECISION TREE AND FLAMMABLE LIQUID RESPONSE SHEET, RESPONDER RESPONDED TO TRAILER, PLACED PACKAGE IN LINED SPILL TRAY AND RETURNED TO PROCESSING CENTER FOR FURTHER PROCESSING
